page.title: 06SHAPINSAY GARAGE
page.content: { Braefoot}is a small farm off the main road.It is used as a garage.There are three men at Braefoot.Two of them work on the farm and the other works in the garage.The{mechanic}started working with cars in 1960.He started because he was interested.He learned by reading books.He fixes cars motorbikes,diggers and tractors.He has big{garages}in which he works.He likes mending cars best.In his spare time he does up his BSA Rocket motorbike.Most of his spares come from the south of Scotland.The cars he repairs most are Minis and Renaults.He hires out a car if yours is being fixed.One of his garages is packed with tyres,switches lights,dashboards and just about everything for{vehicles.
